agves.title: AGVES
agves.subtitle: School Management CRM
agves.description: By simplifying school organization and management, the AGVES CRM ensures that pupils have the funds they need throughout the school year. It ensures smooth communication between the school and the parents, protecting the students with electronic purses and digital access keys.

i-go.title: I GO
i-go.subtitle: Mobility Recharging Locator
i-go.description: Born of the observation that it is difficult for EDPMs (Electric Personal Mobility Devices) and VAEs (Electric Assisted Bikes) to find recharging points. I GO aims to list recharging points and make them easily accessible through a dedicated search engine.

our-story.title: Our Story
our-story.paragraph1: Founded in 2025, Hargile began as a small team with a big vision: to bridge the gap between human creativity and digital innovation. Our founders recognized that technology should enhance human experiences, not replace them.
our-story.paragraph2: What started as a small agency quickly evolved into a comprehensive digital partner for businesses seeking to transform their online presence. Through challenges and successes, we've remained committed to our core belief that meaningful digital experiences begin with human understanding. This is the reason for our H in our name.
